attributes.action: ensure that the Chapeltown Jobcentre in Sheffield remains open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jobcentre Plus management are consulting as to whether to close the Jobcentre in Chapeltown. The Jobcentre provides an essential local public service to the people of the area claiming benefits or seeking a new job. 

The next nearest offices, if closure goes ahead, will involve a lengthy journey that will be costly for people struggling on benefits. 

The Chapeltownn Jobcentre shares premises with a housing centre, offering a range of essential benefits and advice under one roof.
 
It must remain!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that the Chapeltown Jobcentre in Sheffield remains open."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17812

Prime Minister's Office
